UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Government or History, English Language and three (3) other subjects.  A pass in Mathematics is required.
Subjects: Three (3) Social Science or Arts subjects.

Institution Name: ABIA STATE UNIVERSITY, UTURU, ABIA STATE
Direct Entry Requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Chemistry and one of Zoology/Botany/Agric Science/Biology, Geography, Mathematics, Physics, Geology, Economics and Health Science.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and any other Science subject.
Subjects: Chemistry, Biology or Agricultural Science plus Mathematics or Physics.

Institution Name: ABIA STATE UNIVERSITY, UTURU, ABIA STATE
Direct Entry Requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes to include Mathematics or Statistics.

NCE credit in relevant subjects.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics and at least three (3) subjects from Physics, Statistics, Chemistry, Further Mathematics, Economics and Geography.
Subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry and Economics.

Institution Name: ABIA STATE UNIVERSITY, UTURU, ABIA STATE
Direct Entry Requirements:
(i)       Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Mathematics or Physics and Chemistry, Geography or Fine Arts.

ND/HND upper credits in relevant field.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any of Fine Art, Geography or Wood Work, Biology, Economics, Technical Drawing, Further. Mathematics., Introduction to Building Construction, Bricklaying/Block laying, Concreting, Wall, Floors and Ceiling Finishing, Joinery, Carpentary, Decorative Painting, Lining, Sign and Design, Wall Hanging, Colour Mixing/Matching and Glazing, Ceramics, Graphics Design, Graphic Printing, Basic Electricity.
Subjects: Physics, Mathematics, and any of Chemistry, Geography, Art, Biology and Economics.

Institution Name: ABIA STATE UNIVERSITY, UTURU, ABIA STATE
Direct Entry Requirements:
(i)      Two (2) A’ LEVEL passes in Geography and Mathematics

ND/HND upper credit in Town Planning or related programmes plus UTME requirements are accepted
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Geography, and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry, Economics, Government, Biology, Art, History, IRK/CRK, Social Studies and Tech Drawing.
Subjects: Mathematics, Geography and one of Economics, Physics, Chemistry.

Institution Name: ABIA STATE UNIVERSITY, UTURU, ABIA STATE
Direct Entry Requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes or NCE in Biology, Zoology or Botany and one other Science subject
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology and two (2) other Science subject.
